remarks: Lemma for ~ minvec .  The set of all distances from points of ` Y ` to ` A ` are a nonempty set of nonnegative reals.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-May-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
statement:
minvec.x $e |- X = ( Base ` U ) $.
minvec.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` U ) $.
minvec.n $e |- N = ( norm ` U ) $.
minvec.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. CPreHil ) $.
minvec.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( LSubSp ` U ) ) $.
minvec.w $e |- ( ph -> ( U |`s Y ) e. CMetSp ) $.
minvec.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. X ) $.
minvec.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` U ) $.
minvec.r $e |- R = ran ( y e. Y |-> ( N ` ( A .- y ) ) ) $.
minveclem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( R C_ RR /\ R =/= (/) /\ A. w e. R 0 <_ w ) ) $.
$d .- w y $.
$d A w y $.
$d J w y $.
$d N w y $.
$d R w y $.
$d U w y $.
$d X w y $.
$d Y w y $.
$d ph w y $.
